TextView.android:text: IT Network Solutions is a privately owned and operated IT Technology Company serving the private and public sectors since 2000. For over 15 years, we have been helping businesses grow and prosper by delivering customized IT solutions backed by comprehensive engineering expertise and best-in class products. Maintaining, updating and integrating technology can be a full-time endeavor forcing you to take focus away from your business. That’s why we offer reliable IT outsourcing. Our flat-rate Managed IT Service plans help you turn technology into an investment, rather than just an expense. IT Network Solutions is a full service information technology company providing a single point of contact for all of your IT needs, including Consulting, Assessing, Designing, Developing, Implementing, Managing, Maintaining and Supporting your computer network systems. As networking and communication requirements are becoming more complex due to virtualization along with data and voice convergence, standardized off the shelf service offerings by other service providers no longer meet the needs for businesses to remain competitive in today’s market. Often what they need is an infrastructure designed and built to support their specific business communication requirements. IT Network Solutions can offer your company innovative and cost effective solutions needed to help achieve your business objectives. We know the technology, we recognize your dependence and we understand the implications it has on your business.
